text: Thomas Townsend (born November 12, 1996) is an American football punter for the Kansas City Chiefs of the National Football League (NFL). He went to high school at William R. Boone High School in Orlando, Florida. He played his freshman year at the University of Tennessee before returning to Florida to play at the University of Florida. After going undrafted in the 2020 NFL Draft, Townsend signed with the Chiefs as an undrafted free agent. His brother Johnny, played at Florida as well and had a brief NFL career. In the fourth game of his rookie season in 2020, he had two punts that went 65 yards. He finished the game with an average of 60.8 yards and a 47.8 yard net average. ==References== ==External links== * Tennessee Volunteers football bio * Florida Gators football bio * Kansas City Chiefs bio Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Orlando, Florida Category:American football punters Category:Tennessee Volunteers football players Category:Florida Gators football players Category:Kansas City Chiefs players Category:Players of American football from Florida
title: Tommy Townsend
